Careers in the Military

The ASVAB CEP also powers the Careers in the Military website, which provides students with two different ways to explore career options.

Use these tools to explore some military careers. Which ones are you surprised to find?

Guided Exploration

In Guided Exploration, students answer a few questions based on their preferences and the site makes recommendations just for them.

Visit Tool

Advanced Search

Through the Advanced Search portal, students can search for careers by keyword, branch, rank, career cluster, interests, career path, and more.
